entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Lang svc auto-completes `partial Foo` with `unsafe` modifier in a disallowed position #68805
  • WorkspacePullDiagnosticHandler should handle background analysis scope options for both compiler and analyzer diagnostics #68797
  • `ERR_AmbiguousPrimaryConstructorParameterAsColorColorReceiver` logic doesn't find generic extension methods #68796
    17.7

Closed

  • Regression: SyntaxFactory.UsingDirective overload always throws #68761
    Next
  • LSP pull diagnostic handlers should handle None/Disabled option value for compiler and analyzer background analysis options #68798
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33826.293 #68794

PullRequests

Created

  • Include expected custom modifiers for `in` parameters of virtual operators. #68808
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Lookahead parsing for collection exprs vs. local functions. #68807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Force public APIs to return complete results #68804
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not emit empty language property in SARIF log #68801
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Collection literals: use NoneOperation #68795
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection literals: address comments #68793
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix ambiguity parsing collection expressions vs conditional access expressions #68756
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • remove long gone owners #68755
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update VSTelemetry package version #68806
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fixed CA1854: Prefer IDictionary.TryGetValue(TKey, out TValue) occurrences #66515
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Roslyn side changes to enable full solution background analysis in LSP/VSCode #68799
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • More workarounds for VS Code project system issues #68792
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Fixes SyntaxFactory.UsingDirective overload which always throws - #68761 #68762
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Improve parser error recovery for certain collection-literal cases #68788
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [17.6] Validate diagnostics reported by source generators #68775
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, OnDeckForServicing
  • Add support for `System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute` #68702
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Simplify and make consistent query-context tracking in the parser #68757
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix SuppressMessage attributes working on primary constructors #68706
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Retain semicolon during updates of IndexerDeclaration #68768
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect non-local diagnostic classification for VB symbol analyzers #68655
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching for ref readonly parameters #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Enhance the SARIF v2 log to report analyzer execution time #68607
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix ordering issue in analyzer callbacks for nested actions in symbol start analyzers #68490
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
  • Improve sequence point placement in primary constructors and records #68765
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
